name: Lonely Scavenger
description:
This is simply a prototype, there is no content whatsoever in the game currently and trust me, you'll get bored of it in 5 seconds, I'll try and update it from times to times, all you can do now is shoot magical emerald bullets, move left, right and jump.

This is my FIRST game.

---

You're a scavenger of magic, or atleast that's what you know.
Your goal? Explore and unlock as many magic abilities as you can.

---
